ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: This is used in the manualRestart action for the MOs ManagedElement, PlugInUnit and PiuDevice.

ns2:member.ns1:desc: Restarts the MO with the same software. The software is not reloaded from the disk. The traffic is affected least as warm restart is faster and no hardware is reset.
Reloads the software from the disk and restarts the MO. Parts of the hardware are reset, depending on the MO. The traffic is affected more than for a warm restart.
Reloads the software from the disk, restarts the MO, and resets all hardware. The traffic is affected more than for a refresh restart.
Reloads the software from the disk, restarts the MO, and resets and tests the hardware. The traffic is affected most.
